function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Informal settlements with inadequate infrastructure and services","Impact":"Increased risk of disease outbreaks and rapid spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Improvement of infrastructure and services, access to healthcare, and sanitation facilities","Technologies":"Urban planning, sanitation systems, healthcare facilities","People":"Residents of informal settlements","Owner":"Local government, urban planners, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Lack of secure tenure for residents","Impact":"Vulnerability to forced evictions and lack of access to essential services","Mitigation":"Legal recognition of settlement, provision of secure tenure, and access to essential services","Technologies":"Legal frameworks, land documentation systems","People":"Residents of informal settlements","Owner":"Local government, legal authorities"},{"Description":"Mistrust in government messaging and control measures","Impact":"Resistance to public health measures and higher rates of non-compliance","Mitigation":"Cultivating trust through community engagement, transparent communication, and participation in decision-making","Technologies":"Communication platforms, community engagement tools","People":"Residents of informal settlements","Owner":"Local government, community leaders"}]}
